title: BRIEF-ATC Alloys Says It's Working Towards Recommissioning ATC Ferrotungsten Plant
text:
BRIEF-ATC Alloys Says It's Working Towards Recommissioning ATC Ferrotungsten Plant

Commodities 20 minutes ago (Sep 09, 2019 18:20)

BRIEF-ATC Alloys Says It's Working Towards Recommissioning ATC Ferrotungsten Plant Sept 9 (Reuters) - ATC Alloys Ltd : * WORKING TOWARDS RECOMMISSIONING ATC FERROTUNGSTEN PLANT WITH PLAN TO UNDERTAKE THIRD PARTY CONTRACT PROCESSING OPERATIONS * IN DISCUSSIONS WITH A NUMBER OF CONTRACT PROCESSING CUSTOMERS & A NUMBER OF PARTIES IN RELATION TO AN UNSECURED LOAN FACILITY

BRIEF-ATC Alloys Says It's Working Towards Recommissioning ATC Ferrotungsten Plant
description: BRIEF-ATC Alloys Says It's Working Towards Recommissioning ATC Ferrotungsten Plant
